name: market for biomethane, low pressure | biomethane, low pressure | Cutoff, U
description:
ecoQuery: https://ecoquery.ecoinvent.org/3.10/cutoff/dataset/17759/documentation

This is a market activity. Each market represents the consumption mix of a product in a given geography, connecting suppliers with consumers of the same product in the same geographical area. Markets group the producers and also the imports of the product (if relevant) within the same geographical area. They also account for transport to the consumer and for the losses during that process, when relevant.;This is the market for  'biomethane, low pressure', in the geography of Switzerland.;This market contains no transport or losses, as they are irrelevant for the delivered product.;biomethane, low pressure' is a non-fossil fuel with a calorific value of 46.50 MJ/kg. It is used as a gaseous fuel and is sourced from pressure reduction from high pressure biomethane. This provides the energy requirement and the emissions of a low pressure distribution network for 1 MJ of energy. Its main applications are in the following sectors: biofuel, industrial and district heat and electricity.

This activity starts at the gate of the activities that produce 'biomethane, low pressure',  within the geography of Switzerland.

This activity ends with the supply of  biomethane, low pressure', to the consumers of this product. Transport or losses are considered irrelevant for this product.
category: D:Electricity, gas, steam and air conditioning supply/35:Electricity, gas, steam and air conditioning supply/352:Manufacture of gas; distribution of gaseous fuels through mains/3520:Manufacture of gas; distribution of gaseous fuels through mains
